meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Scott Blish Nikhil Neelakantan Alex Jacob Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7050.

td.p: Scott Blish, a technical writer and stay-at-home dad originally from Elmira Heights, New York
Nikhil Neelakantan, an operations analyst from Richmond, Virginia
Alex Jacob, a currency trader from Chicago, Illinois (whose 5-day cash winnings total $129,401)

tr.td: STARTS WITH A VOWEL
SPORTS MOVIES
I'M JUST A BILL
AUTOMOTIVE ABBREVS.
LITERARY MEALTIME?
FLASHBACK FRIDAY

$3,001
The Hunger Games')
